org.maugiam.shoppingcart.wherehouse

Class AbsItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • org.maugiam.shoppingcart.wherehouse.AbsItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IItem
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Item, Offer

    public abstract class AbsItem
extends java.util.Observable
implements IItem
    This is an abstract class that implements Iitem interface. This class abstracts all the common behavior of classes implementing the IItem interface.
    Author:
    Mauro J Giamberardino
